  • polylidar.create_tri_mesh_copy

polylidar.create_tri_mesh_copy¶

polylidar.create_tri_mesh_copy(vertices, triangles, calc_normals=True)¶

Creates a copy of a tri mesh, triangles of int dtype. Mostly used for Open3D triangles.

Parameters

  • vertices (polylidar_pybind.MatrixDouble) – Triangle vertices in Matrix Form

  • triangles (polylidar_pybind.MatrixInt) – Triangle point indices in Matrix Form

  • calc_normals (bool, optional, default=True) – Compute triangle normals.

Returns

polylidar_pybind.HalfEdgeTriangulation
